title: bitnote
author: bitnote
content: How do I get notified when someone calls or tags me so I can respond? I see some settings  in the profile but I can't find any settings related to this one.I have seen many members automatically know when someone is calling them and go there to answer,

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Use tryninja notification bot:  [TELEGRAM] Yet Another BitcoinTalk Notification BOT (merits, mentions, topics,+) It’s a telegram bot, that allows you monitor boards, threads (including a specific user replies in a thread) and also get notified when your username is mentioned in the forum, monitor when you receive merits, track a Particular phrase, and much more. Just click on the link above and follow the direction on how to get everything started.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: For merits and mentions or quote, use the ninjastic telegram bot which its link has been posted by other users. It is the best for me. For replies, on each thread, you will see notify beside reply, click on it to enable new reply of post on that thread. I prefer it to ninjastic because once there are new posts, you will get only one notification instead of continuous notification on ninjastic telegram bot, but this may be about preference.For new topics, you will see notify beside create new topic. For forum to notify you, it would be through the email.

I see some settings  in the profile but I can't find any settings related to this one.I have seen many members automatically know when someone is calling them and go there to answer,In addition to using a telegram bot for notifications on merits, tags and mentions, you can also make use of the notify me button, for you to get updates on any thread this is being activated on, but this notify me button only works for tracking a thread new replies and you will get notified through your email address used in registration, the challenges with using this is that you will have to active in reading and clicking those notifications sent in other to keep you updated because once you stop checking on them, you also stops receiving the alert.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: bitnote on October 13, 2023, 09:00:41 AMHow do I get notified when someone calls or tags me so I can respond?Quote from: Royse777 on October 13, 2023, 09:06:30 AMYou can always use search feature, it's does not do great help but it works just fine.If you're referring to the results we normally get by using the default search field from the upper right corner of pages, you're right but the advanced search page works flawlessly for mentions and tags.@bitnoteYou can use the advanced search feature in two ways:Click the search tab button from the menu [upper left corner] > Type your forum name on the "Search for:" field > Choose its time period on the "Message age:" field > Click search.Click the magnifier icon from the upper right corner of the page [beside search field] > Follow the rest of the steps I mentioned earlier.

comments.body: Quote from: bitnote on October 13, 2023, 09:00:41 AMHow do I get notified when someone calls or tags me so I can respond? I see some settings  in the profile but I can't find any settings related to this one.I have seen many members automatically know when someone is calling them and go there to answer,Well you already got some options like TryNinja's Telegram Notifier (this is No.1 and the best) and on the second is LoyceV's Notification Bot.I will give you another option (I was using this option before using TryNinja's Telegram notifier). Ok caution! Although it's not an ideal solution and works much slower then above two but you can try You have to create a google alert like this:Code:bitnote site:bitcointalk.orgAbove code will search for your name "bitnote" on "bitcointalk" and will send you an email notification if there's any new result.https://www.google.com/alerts - Click Show options then change below default settings - Change How often: to As-it-happens- Change How many: to All results - Click Create AlertPlease note this all depends on Google Crawler how often it will traverse bitcointalk and how soon you will be notified.

Once you install that bot and after that anyone who mentions your name in a thread or post then you'll get notified for that mention. That's the best way to see all the mentions that you get in threads or posts and you won't miss a mention with that bot. The best thing about TryNinja's bot is that it's complete free and open-source and you an add changes or extra features in it if you know software development. If you really want to see that who tags you or calls you in a thread or a post then install that bot and you're good to go. The ones who see that thing automatically are most probably using TryNinja's bot or they have made their own bots.You'll also get notified if someone sends merit/merits to your post and you know the more merits you get the more dopamine you'll have. If you want to have dopamine plus all those extra feature then install TryNinja's bot and trust me you'll love the experience. Best of luck!
